content:
Snack recipe: India Servings : 3 Duration : 10 mins It's very easy to make anybody can cook this simple recipe with no oil. Actually it is a starter for any party at home or have it at get together with friends or family. In this dish, it is prepared with Papad & veggies with spices. Note:
  1. You can make crispy Papad in microwave
  2. You can toast on tawa without oil
  3. You can also toast it on gas stove
All three are easy to make and they take very less time to make crisp Papad. Nutrition facts: Onion: Vitamins: C & B6 Minerals:Â Iron, Calcium, Magnesium & Potassium Tomato: Vitamins: A, C & B Minerals: Iron, Calcium, Magnesium & Potassium Carrot: Vitamins: A, C & B6 Minerals: Iron,Calicum, Magnesium & potassium Coriander: Vitamins: A & C Lemon : Vitamins: C Minerals:Â Iron,Calicum, Magnesium & potassium Today, I prepared Masala Papad with spices and nuts Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Papad - 3 Onion - finely chopped - 1/2 cup Tomato - finely chopped - 1/2 cup Carrot - grated 1/2 cup Coriander leaves - chopped - 1/2 cup Red chilly powder - 1 tsp Chaat Masala - 1 tsp Dry mango powder - 1/2 tsp Salt - 1/2 tsp Lemon juice - 1 tb sp Roasted peanuts - 1/2 cup Sev - 3 tb sp Procedure:
  • Take a plate & papad
  • Cut the Papad into 4 equal parts by using scissors
  • Now keep Papad in microwave for 30 secs
  • Roasted Papad is ready
  • You can also make full Papad in microwave. The other methods to toast Papad I said in above note
  • Now add onion, tomato, Carrot & coriander leaves on papad
  • Sprinkle salt, red chilly powder, chaat Masala & dry mango powder on each papad
  • Add 1 tsp lemon juice, roasted peanuts & sev
  • Masala Papad is ready
  • Serve it as a Evening snack / party starter / kids party
  • Enjoy your day & Happy Cooking ðŸ˜Š
